AREA VIII.
PHYSICAL FACILITIES
D. Offices and Staff rooms

S.1 The administrative
offices are accessible to
stakeholders
S.2 All offices are accessible
and conveniently located in
accordance to their functions
Student Government Headquarters (SGHQ)

S.3 There are offices and workfaces
for all officials, faculty and
administrative staff.
The Faculty Room
Administrators’ Office currently housed at MSF 101

S.4 Administration and faculty
offices and staff rooms are clean,
well lighted and ventilated.
S.5 Function rooms and lounge are
available and accessible
Faculty Lounge
Office of Student Affairs and Services

S.7 There is internal and external
communication system

students
Newly renovated Faculty and Student Comfort Rooms

I.1 All offices are furnished with the
necessary equipment, furniture,
supplies and materials.

maintained.

O.1 The offices and staff rooms are
adequate and conducive to
working environment.
